page.title: 01LITTLE ORME REGION
page.content: The main feature of the coastline is the {Little Orme} - carboniferous limestone, wild, popular nesting for birds. The beach towards {Llandudno}is good for bathing,sailing and wind surfing. There is no industry. Formerly mining on the {Little Orme}.Hinterland of fields, woods and farmland with a lot of wildlife different to the birds and flowers of the headland. Three residential areas - {Penrhynside}the original village,{ {Penrhyn Bay}at the foot of the {Little {Orme,}which was built between 1930 and 1960, {Penrhyn Beach }a new estate, mainly elderly and retired people. It is possible to see the {Isle of Man on a clear day from the top of the cliff.
